sentences.sContent: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture.
sentences.sCn: 你要创造自己的生活。就像创作雕塑那样，一刀一笔。

sentences.sContent: If this sculpture helps just one woman decide not to proceed with unnecessary plastic surgery on their genitals then it will have succeeded.
sentences.sContent_eng: If this sculpture helps just one woman decide not to proceed with unnecessary plastic surgery on their genitals then it will have succeeded.
sentences.sCn: 如果这些雕塑只是帮助一位女性决定不再继续那不必要的生殖器整形手术，那么它就成功了。

words.tran: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）

trans.tranOther: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist
